lines.text: Tu kal chala jayega to main kya karunga, tu yaad bahut ayega to main kya karunga... When you leave tommorrow, then what will I do, when I miss you, then what will I do...
Amiron ki shyam garibon ke naam... This evening of the rich is in the name ofthe poor...

Chiti aai hai vatan se chiti aai hai, badey dino ke baad hum bevatano ko yaad vatan ki mitti aai hai... A letter has come from our home country, after months, we immigrants remember the soil of our home country...
